title: Wolf Pack
description:
Description :
        The marriage between two wolf packs' alphas. The sublime non-human BL between strong, fluffy creatures. 
There's a land up the North Pole where the wolves rule. Garm, the valley's chief, by some certain circumstance, abided by convention and made a pledge with Hati, the lake's chief. 
Garm is straightforward and tough, while Hati is over-serious and pure. 
As the alphas, they respect each other's pride as males, but at first the two of them didn't really get along. However, their bond was deepened as they were experiencing each other's way of life, and slowly it was turning them into a unique pair of mates.
